patient_illness: anxious and stressed, trouble sleeping, racing heart, exhaustion

medication.name: Sertraline
medication.description: This should help manage your anxiety symptoms. It's important to take it as prescribed and be patient, as it may take a few weeks to see the full effects.

therapy.name: Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)
therapy.description: This type of therapy can help you identify and change negative thought patterns and behaviors.

exercises: Regular physical exercise: Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise, like walking or yoga, most days of the week.
Mindfulness or meditation: Practicing mindfulness or meditation daily can help reduce stress. There are many apps and online resources that can guide you through these practices.
precautions: Avoid caffeine and alcohol as they can worsen anxiety symptoms.
Make sure to get enough sleep, and try to maintain a regular sleep schedule.
